title: AppInsights Web API Metrics
description: Standard metrics related to Application Insights Web API.

prerequisites.messageMarkdown: Ensure your application supports autoinstrumentation in Azure Monitor Application Insights and that it is enabled. For more details, refer to the documentation: [What is autoinstrumentation for Azure Monitor Application Insights?](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/app/codeless-overview).
